channel.title: CVE Feed for Theme Freesia -- Pixgraphy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Theme Freesia -- Pixgraphy

item.title: CVE-2024-35740|2024-08-02T03:14:53.886Z -- theme%20freesia -- pixgraphy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Theme Freesia Pixgraphy allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Pixgraphy: from n/a through 1.3.8.
